document_data.name: Wuloona Dor
document_data.mainbody:
'''Wuloona Dor''' was a [[gold dwarf]] commoner from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Do they really think we'll believe everything they put in the paper?''|Wuloona Dor}}
document_data.Description: Wuloona was a clean shaven [[dwarf|dwarven]] woman with dark skin and pale green eyes. Her graying hair was gathered in a braid wrapped around her head.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Wuloona Dor was among those citizens of Baldur's Gate who did not trust the new Grand Duke [[Lord Gortash]]. She despised Gortash's control of the city's [[broadsheet]] â€“ ''[[Baldur's Mouth]]'', and mistrusted all of the lies printed on his behalf. She found him despicable.
